sentence.text: Low-density lipoprotein receptor-related protein 4 (kidney development) is a multi-functional protein implicated in bone, kidney and neurological diseases including Cenani-Lenz syndactyly (negative regulation of cysteine-type endopeptidase activity involved in apoptotic process), sclerosteosis, osteoporosis, congenital myasthenic syndrome and myasthenia gravis.

entity.text: negative regulation of cysteine-type endopeptidase activity involved in apoptotic process
